midPane.h5: Treatment Effect eXplorer for Microboal Ecology eXperiments
midPane.div: by Scott W Olesen and Eric J Alm

DESCRIPTION
TEXMEX is an R package designed to help visualize and interpret community dynamics observed in microbial ecology experiments that use sequencing count data. Given one inoculum split into two replicates, one control and one experimental, which OTUs are growing or shrinking in response to the treatment? TEXMEX is designed to help account for changes in the control unit's community composition as well as dampen compositional effects that might occur in either unit.
